The Tiaraâ€™s Prachi Mishra wins Miss Congeniality and Ipsita Pati wins Miss Ravishing at Pantaloons Femina Miss India 2012. Anvita Sudarshan Trained by the Tiara wins First Runner up at the 2012 Miss India Worldwide Pageant held in Suriname, South America.The Tiaraâ€™s Pageant Aspirants make it to Pantaloons Femina Miss India 2012. The Tiara congratulates Ipsita Pati, Prachi Mishra, and Ruhi Singh for making it to the Femina Miss India 2012 Finals. Dipna Patel and Huzan Mewawala win Femina Style Diva Winner 2012 and 2nd Runner Up.
